ThingDef.label: Imperial Lambda Shuttle
ThingDef.description:
Comissioned for troop movement and small cargo, the Lambda-class T-4a shuttle was designed by Sienar Fleet Systems for the Empire. Due to its ease of control and lack of weapons it regulaly falls the hands of other factions.
Passenger cap: 12 Space flight: Yes
---------------------------- Speed: Normal Fuel cap: 600L Fuel efficiency: Normal ---------------------------- Cargo cap: 1000kg Internal power plant: 500w

ThingDef.label: TIE Fighter
ThingDef.description:
Built by Sienar Fleet Systems, the TIE/Ln starfighter was the standard Imperial starfighter. It features twin laser cannons but no shielding.
Passenger cap: 1 Space flight: Yes
--Military-- Bombs: 5 Accuracy: Good Build: Strike Craft ---------------------------- Speed: Excellent Fuel cap: 800L Fuel efficiency: Normal ---------------------------- Cargo cap: 350kg Internal power plant: 700w

ThingDef.label: TIE Interceptor
ThingDef.description:
The TIE/In starfighter is an upgraded version of the standard TIE with quad laser cannons, upgraded targeting, higher speed, and better manueverability.
Passenger cap: 1 Space flight: Yes
--Military-- Bombs: 5/10 Accuracy: Excellent Build: Strike Craft ---------------------------- Speed: Excellent Fuel cap: 800L Fuel efficiency: Normal ---------------------------- Cargo cap: 500kg Internal power plant: 900w

ThingDef.label: TIE Defender
ThingDef.description:
The TIE/D defender has an arsenal of four laser cannons, two ion cannons, two warhead launchers making it the most advanced starfighter available.
Passenger cap: 1 Space flight: Yes
--Military-- Bombs: 15/15 Accuracy: Excellent Build: Strike Craft ---------------------------- Speed: Excellent Fuel cap: 800L Fuel efficiency: Normal ---------------------------- Cargo cap: 500kg Internal power plant: 900w

ThingDef.label: TIE Bomber
ThingDef.description:
The TIE/sa bomber is a larger, less maneuverable TIE starfighter used for destroying large starships and pinpoint-precision bombing.
Passenger cap: 1 Space flight: Yes
--Military-- Bombs: 10/25 Accuracy: Excellent Build: Strike Craft ---------------------------- Speed: Excellent Fuel cap: 800L Fuel efficiency: Normal ---------------------------- Cargo cap: 500kg Internal power plant: 900w

ThingDef.label: Vader's Custom TIE
ThingDef.description:
The TIE Advanced x1 is an advanced prototype starfighter touted as a replacement for the standard TIE Fighter tested by Darth Vader.
Passenger cap: 1 Space flight: Yes
--Military-- Bombs: 10/25 Accuracy: Excellent Build: Strike Craft ---------------------------- Speed: Excellent Fuel cap: 800L Fuel efficiency: Normal ---------------------------- Cargo cap: 500kg Internal power plant: 900w

ThingDef.label: Slave 1
ThingDef.description:
Slave I is a heavily modified prototype Firespray-31-class patrol and attack craft used by famed Mandalorian bounty hunters Jango Fett and his cloned son, Boba Fett.
Passenger cap: 1 Space flight: Yes
--Military-- Bombs: 10/25 Accuracy: Excellent Build: Strike Craft ---------------------------- Speed: Excellent Fuel cap: 800L Fuel efficiency: Normal ---------------------------- Cargo cap: 500kg Internal power plant: 900w

ThingDef.label: X-Wing
ThingDef.description:
Made by the Incom Corporation, the X-Wing starighter is marked by their distinctive S-foils and is heavily armed with quad laser cannons.
Passenger cap: 1 Space flight: Yes
--Military-- Bombs: 5/10 Accuracy: Good Build: Strike Craft ---------------------------- Speed: Good Fuel cap: 1000L Fuel efficiency: Normal ---------------------------- Cargo cap: 500kg Internal power plant: 900w

ThingDef.label: A-Wing
ThingDef.description:
Made by Kuat Systems Engineering, the A-Wing starighter is a strike craft with higher speed and manueverability than it's X-Wing counterpart at the expense of firepower.
Passenger cap: 1 Space flight: Yes
--Military-- Bombs: 2/5 Accuracy: Excellent Build: Strike Craft ---------------------------- Speed: Excellent Fuel cap: 1000L Fuel efficiency: Normal ---------------------------- Cargo cap: 350kg Internal power plant: 900w

ThingDef.label: Y-Wing
ThingDef.description:

Passenger cap: 1 Space flight: Yes
--Military-- Bombs: 2/5 Accuracy: Excellent Build: Strike Craft ---------------------------- Speed: Excellent Fuel cap: 1000L Fuel efficiency: Normal ---------------------------- Cargo cap: 350kg Internal power plant: 900w
